full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=================================
### Title
Parting Compound (W8482-231183/A)

### Description
The Department of National Defence invites suppliers to submit proposals for the procurement of parting compounds for delivery to two Canadian military bases: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax in Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt in British Columbia.

**Tender Details:**
--------------------

*   Solicitation Reference Number: W8482-231183/A
*   Tender Closing Date: 01 March 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
*   Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
*   End User Entity: Department of National Defence
*   Contact Person: Michael Dettorre, Email: [michael.dettorre@forces.gc.ca](mailto:michael.dettorre@forces.gc.ca), Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7

**Procurement Requirements:**

*   The tender requires two types of parting compounds:
    *   Item 1: PARTING COMPOUND, GSIN: 6850, NSN: 01-4474411, with a quantity of 57 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
    *   Item 2: PARTING COMPOUND, GSIN: 6850, NSN: 01-4474411, with a quantity of 64 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
*   Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will be rejected.
*   The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Document Attachments:**

*   Amendment 001 (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/6bf4d1160bd0d7da5dc63d6b17414146/w8482-231183_amendment001_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/6bf4d1160bd0d7da5dc63d6b17414146/w8482-231183_amendment001_en.pdf)
*   Amendment 001 (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/8555de73b84256d
